Text.Page:
Karascha, the leader of the demons, threatened the safety of the expedition and the successful completion of its objectives.

You entered Karascha's lair with other soldiers and killed him. Karascha's final words revealed that the demon leader's death was merely to distract you from a greater purpose, and that Karascha will return. To the delight of Leander, you also obtained a document that says Elleon still lives.

Everything has led to this moment, . Karascha commands the forces that defeated the first expedition, but he didn't escape unscathed.

The coward hides in catacombs beneath the giant tree—if this codex is to be believed.

Enter the catacombs by way of the {@LinkCreature:213#1015#teleportal} at the shrine to the northwest. Find Karascha—and end him.
Even at this distance, we felt a shift in the energy of the gorge. Karascha is dead, then?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Karascha had this missive."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Another missive? Let's examine this...oh, my! We must get this to Leander at once—Leander!
Karascha's death sent ripples across the Island of Dawn. We shall remember his death with great satisfaction.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"We also found this."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

What? Another captured document to translate? Let's take a look.

Hmmm, it's not written by Karascha. What's this? Could it be?"What is it?"

It says, "Elleon escaped our grasp. We've notified agents in Arun to find him and silence him once and for all."

He didn't run off—he was captured! It looks like he got away, though.

We'll have to tell Adria at once, . Until we know who to trust, tell no one else.

Okay. So Elleon was captured. At least we know he got away—if only that could tell us where he went.

Don't tell anyone about this. We don't need everyone worried sick. Just tell people he walked off—they'll believe that.
